Text.Page:
Are you ready to face Vergos? A god? You will have to overcome four stages, one after the other, and in each one you will face different challenges.

Your progress will be saved after each stage you complete, and you will be able to leave the dungeon if you wish to take a break. When you return, you will be able to continue from where you left off. But bear in mind that this dungeon will be reset every Tuesday as usual. After that you will have to start over from the first stage, no matter where you were before!
- Complete stage 4 a total of 10x to receive the God Slayer title.
- For each stage you complete you will receive a rewards box whose contents are shared among all party members.
